content: waffle crochet dishcloth by chip flory chippukun on ravelry com i m sure that i m not the first to come up with a waffle stitch pattern similar to this i didn t see anything exactly like it on ravelry and thought i d share yarn 100% cotton worsted weight hook h8 5mm finished size approx 7 x 7 inches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet st stitch fpdc front post double_crochet note to alter pattern to match desired gauge the starting chain must be in multiples of 3 the number of boxes going across plus 2 with an additional 3 for the turning chain just work row 2 and 3 until nearly square finishing with row 2 the instructions below will create a design with row of 6 boxes 6 x 3 = 18 18 + 2 + 3 = 23 start chain 23 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each chain across row 2 chain 2 turn skip first st double_crochet in next double_crochet fpdc around next two double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet across double_crochet in top of turning chain 2nd chain row 3 chain 2 turn skip first st fpdc around next double_crochet double_crochet in next two fpdc fpdc around next double_crochet across double_crochet in top of turning chain row 4 - 11 repeat row 2 and 3 four times row 12 repeat row 2 edging with right side facing chain 2 1 half_double_crochet between each st to the corner 3 half_double_crochet in corner working in spaces from final double_crochet and turning chain down the side work 2 half_double_crochet in the next space 1 half_double_crochet in the next to the corner 3 half_double_crochet in the corner 1 half_double_crochet between each st to the corner 3 half_double_crochet in the corner work 2 half_double_crochet in the next space 1 half_double_crochet in the next down the side to the final corner 2 half_double_crochet in the final corner connect to 2nd starting chain with slip st finish off ©2011 chip flory permission given for any personal use including crafting items for sale
